item.title: OVER: Finns to end restrictions next month...
item.description:
apnews.com
COPENHAGEN, Denmark (AP) — Finland will end all COVID-19 restrictions next month, Prime Minister Sanna Marin said Monday. Marin said her Social Democratic-led government would negotiate with the other parties in parliament the timetable for the removal of the restrictions.

item.title: Boris Johnson gets 'partygate' report but questions linger...
item.description:
apnews.com

item.title: FRESH FACE SUPER BOWL
item.description:
apnews.com
Two years ago, the Cincinnati Bengals were the NFL's worst team. Now they're headed to the Super Bowl to play the Los Angeles Rams — in the Rams' home stadium. Matching the biggest comeback in an AFC championship game, the Bengals rallied from an 18-point hole to stun Kansas City 27-24 in overtime Sunday for their first trip to the big game since the 1988 season.
